item.title: Equity and Diversity
item.author: Patricia Menéndez. Powered by the Story theme for Hugo.
item.description:
%!s()
  • According to the UNESCO Institute for Statistics, “Women account for a minority of the world’s researchers”

item.title: Homeward Bound
item.author: Patricia Menéndez. Powered by the Story theme for Hugo.
item.description:
Homeward Bound aims at empowering women for the greater good.

I have had the priviledge to be selected together with another 99 women to take part in Homeward Bound. Homeward bound is a groundbreaking leadership program for women with a background in STEMM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, and Medicine).
